pages.text:
There are 3 different stats. There are flat values, like '+3 Damage'. These are multiplied by things like '+10% Damage, which would make your Damage stat 3.3. And after that, the final increase is calculated with the formula below:

500*stat/(500+stat)

125 Damage ends up being a 100% damage increase, 109.76 Crit Chance ends up being 100%.

Damage Reduction formula is adjusted to:
armor/(120+armor-150toughness/(toughness+50))

Protection damage reduction is halved on top of this.

Jump Boost utility accessory reduces fall damage accordingly (100% Jump Boost = halved fall damage).

There are 3 different stats.
